ing: 1 (3 ounce) package cherry-flavored gelatin (such as JELL-OÂ®)
des: "Great as a side with a ham or turkey!"
ins: Dissolve cinnamon candies in water in a saucepan over medium heat. Mix in gelatin and allow to dissolve; remove from heat and stir applesauce into mixture. Pour into a serving dish and refrigerate until set, about 2 hours.
